page.title: 09Cribyn School.
page.content: Cribyn school is a small school.It has three classrooms two teachers and three cooks.I like it better than my other school because there are not so many children.In my other school there were nearly 200 children.The two teachers are called Mrs Morgan and Mr Howells.Every Thursday there are violin lessons for 3 of the children and on Tuesdays there are Welsh lessons for some children.The yard is quite big and there is some grass. One classroom is empty because there are not so many children as last year. The other teacher was Mrs.Jones.The dinner in school is nice. Mrs Harries makes them and Mrs Morgan helps. Mrs Evans does the washing up and cleans the school.We have swimming in Lampeter on Fridays. We pay 45p for the bus.
